FAQ

Quick answers to the most common questions.

What is PetMind?+−
PetMind is a mobile app that helps you understand your pet's behavior. Upload photos or videos of your pet and get insights into their emotional state and needs.
Does it work on iOS and Android?+−
Yes. Our mobile app is available for both iOS and Android devices.
How can I contact support?+−
Email support@petmind.app and we'll get back within 1–2 business days.

Still stuck? Contact us.
